full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN PO'I ZHABS BRTAN TSIGS BCAD BKRA SHIS DGU BRTZEGS MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN PO SRID GSAL MI'I LHA MCHOG NYID KYI ZHABS BRTAN TSIGS BCAD BKRA SHIS DGU BRTZEGS MA'I GRANGS MTSUNGS 'DI NI, GONG MA'I BKA' LUNG GIS AIL KU SANG HU THOG THUR 'BOD PA BSTAN 'DZIN DAM PA'I SKYES MCHOG NO YON NO MONG HANG RIN CHEN RDO RJE NAS GSAR BSKRUN DGON SDE DE NYID KYI ZHAL 'DON DU TSUGS BZHED KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, ,MKHAN PO NO MON HAN GYI MING 'DZIN BAN CHUNG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB KYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS NAS PHUL BA LAGS, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB,
